医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
缺锌会增加肺部感染的风险饮食中缺锌会促进鲍曼不动杆菌引起的肺部感染；根据 11 月 15 日发表在《自然微生物学》杂志上的一项新研究，这是呼吸机相关性肺炎的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632deafe-ba1a-41f6-80ab-a60b45f36748 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:36:45 -0500 Zinc deficiency linked to increased risk of lung infection
光脉冲有望控制癫痫发作加州大学旧金山分校、加州大学圣克鲁斯分校和加州大学伯克利分校的研究人员利用光脉冲来预防神经元中的癫痫样活动，这有一天可能成为一种治疗癫痫的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e3f081-c8d0-42a6-a0d0-8dd0ed201989 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:02:52 -0500 Pulses of light show promise in controlling seizures
怀孕期间的抗癫痫药物与儿童神经发育风险有关德雷克塞尔多恩西夫公共卫生学院研究人员的最新数据显示，在怀孕期间服用抗癫痫药物来控制癫痫发作和精神疾病的母亲所生的孩子可能会面临更大的神经发育疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac8597bd-9168-43e5-b5d0-a76d2c68c3dc Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:20:14 -0500 Antiseizure medications during pregnancy linked to neurodevelopmental risks in children
研究人员发现突变如何破坏蛋白质剪接并导致疾病一个国际研究小组发现了一种对细胞蛋白质生产至关重要的新机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6612cf0a-7c94-4e08-88fc-55edd5013193 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:00:00 -0500 Researchers discover how mutations disrupt protein splicing and cause disease
特定的氧化还原蛋白被确定为铁死亡的关键调节因子亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的研究人员与东北大学的同事合作，发现一种特定的氧化还原蛋白是铁死亡的关键调节剂，铁死亡是一种受调节的氧化细胞死亡的形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55f6fa50-b5b7-443c-9a79-43ac7b32c00e Fri, 15 Nov 2024 21:46:00 -0500 Specific redox protein identified as a critical regulator of ferroptosis
孟菲斯系统揭示了不同年龄段的疫苗反应差异mRNA 疫苗在 COVID-19 大流行期间挽救了生命，但老年人对疫苗的免疫反应低于年轻人。为什么？由 Byron Brook 博士和 Ofer Levy 医学博士领导的波士顿儿童医院的研究人员找到了一些答案，同时提供了一个可以在培养皿中模拟疫苗反应的新系统的概念验证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/MEMPHIS-system-sheds-light-on-vaccine-response-differences-across-ages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/MEMPHIS-system-sheds-light-on-vaccine-response-differences-across-ages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85fc8f1b-8e7c-44bd-b5f3-75a2eee99b63 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 18:09:00 -0500 MEMPHIS system sheds light on vaccine response differences across ages
久坐时间过长与心脏病风险增加有关美国心脏病学会旗舰期刊 JACC 上发表的一项研究显示，白天坐着、躺着或躺着的时间越长，可能会增加患心血管疾病 (CVD) 和死亡的风险。会议 2024。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Excessive-sedentary-time-linked-to-higher-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Excessive-sedentary-time-linked-to-higher-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6056b79-9cc6-4887-a4e8-402ad2bbd78d Fri, 15 Nov 2024 17:58:00 -0500 Excessive sedentary time linked to higher heart disease risk
NYU Langone Health 继续获得 Leapfrog 的“A”安全评级纽约大学朗格健康中心始终处于患者安全的最前沿，其所有住院地点都获得了 Leapfrog Group（一家专注于医疗保健安全和质量的全国性非营利监管组织）的“A”评级。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/NYU-Langone-Health-continues-streak-of-A-safety- rating-from-Leapfrog.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/NYU-Langone-Health-continues-streak-of-A-safety- rating-from-Leapfrog.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a705ae9-2f01-464d-b31a-d13b42566b30 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 17:50:00 -0500 NYU Langone Health continues streak of "A" safety rating from Leapfrog
肠道微生物组被发现在慢性疾病进展中发挥关键作用肠道微生物组是人类消化道中由数万亿微生物组成的生态系统，与慢性疾病的关系越来越密切。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Gut-microbiome-found-to-play-key-role-in-chronic-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Gut-microbiome-found-to-play-key-role-in-chronic-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=649c4511-caf7-4968-9f64-11d92843f9ea Fri, 15 Nov 2024 17:43:00 -0500 Gut microbiome found to play key role in chronic disease progression
基因组监测可能彻底改变抗生素耐药性的斗争在 COVID-19 大流行期间，基因组监测对于帮助了解 SARS-CoV-2 病毒的进化和传播至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Genomic-surveillance-could-revolutionize-the-fight-against-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Genomic-surveillance-could-revolutionize-the-fight-against-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7070624f-d2fa-4e2c-8b8f-7a092c74cfa3 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 17:37:00 -0500 Genomic surveillance could revolutionize the fight against antimicrobial resistance
